programme.title: Chaos
programme.desc: Two cops partner up in order to uncover how a group of bank robbers managed to escape from a bank during a heist that apparently has other motives than just stealing money.

programme.title: Wonder Woman
programme.desc: Princess Diana, Princess of the Amazon, was trained at Paradise Island to become an invincible warrior. When an American pilot lands on her island and tells her about the war raging in the outside world, she decides to go with him. As she tries to stop ongoing wars while testing her superpowers.

programme.title: Aeon Flux
programme.desc: Set in the year 2415, a deadly pathogenic virus has killed 99% of the Earth's population. Æon Flux is a mysterious assassin and a member of The Monicans, a secret group aiming to overthrow the government. After a mission to destroy a surveillance station, Æon comes home to find her sister Una has been mistaken for a Monican and killed. When Æon is sent on a mission to kill the government's leader, Trevor Goodchild, she discovers that both she and the Monicans are being manipulated by council members in a secret coup.

programme.title: 16 Blocks
programme.desc: Detective Jack Mosley, who is an alcoholic, is assigned a last minute mission after a hard day's work. The mission is to escort a witness 16 blocks from the police station to the courthouse, but he discovers that several people want the witness dead, and Jack is faced with an unlikely situation where he has to choose between his duty and his loyalty to his police officer colleagues.

programme.title: Jumper
programme.desc: David, a teenager with teleportation abilities, finds himself in a local library where he discovers his ability to 'jump' from one place to another. He decides to make use of this newly-acquired ability to leave his abusive father and plan a stable life for himself.

programme.title: Pompeii
programme.desc: In 79 A.D., a slave turned gladiator races against time to save his beloved from marrying a corrupt Roman Senator, as Mount Vesuvius erupts in the Roman city of Pompeii.

programme.title: Ride Along 2
programme.desc: James and Ben team up again for a second Ride Along film.James and Ben team up again for a second Ride Along, and try to bust some drug dealing operations in Miami, before Ben’s wedding to James’ sister.

programme.title: Knight and Day
programme.desc: June Havens meets Secret Agent Miller, at the airport by accident. She gets involved with him in a secret operation to protect an energy source that holds the key to infinite power. Things get more complicated when Miller's enemies tell June that Miller suffers from a nervous breakdown.

programme.title: Mr & Mrs. Smith
programme.desc: A married couple going through marriage counseling discover that they are both assassins working for competing agencies when they are charged with killing each other.

programme.title: The Fast and the Furious: Tokyo Drift
programme.desc: American teenager Sean likes to participate in illegal car races. When he wrecks his rival's car and a race ends in disaster, he's sent to his father in Tokyo to avoid a prison sentence, and there, he discovers the underworld of street racing.

programme.title: Max Payne
programme.desc: NYPD detective Max Payne is hunting the killers of his wife. While bodies are showing up in the street, a body of a woman is found and Max was the last one who saw her alive. With her sister on his hunt, he's both the hunter and the hunted.(c)

programme.title: Batman Begins
programme.desc: The film traces the emergence of Batman, as he travels to the Far East to study martial arts. He soon discovers about the League of Shadows, whose purpose is to eradicate the crime-ridden city of Gotham as it plunges into wickedness. Batman then starts his quest to combat corruption.(c)

programme.title: Edge of Darkness
programme.desc: Detective Thomas Craven is investigating the murder of his activist daughter. He not only exposes sensitive aspects of her secret life, but also clashes with crime organizations that try to erase any thread that may link her to them.(c)

programme.title: Equilibrium
programme.desc: In the future, the system that governs the world denies art, music, books, and feelings. ( John Preston) the man in charge of enforcing the law, rebels against it and tries to destroy it.(c)

programme.title: Code of Silence
programme.desc: Eddie Cusack is a Chicago police officer who goes on a special mission with his team. When the stakeout unexpectedly turns into a shootout, he finds himself in the middle of a gang war.(c)

programme.title: Max Payne
programme.desc: NYPD detective Max Payne is hunting the killers of his wife. While bodies are showing up in the street, a body of a woman is found and Max was the last one who saw her alive. With her sister on his hunt, he's both the hunter and the hunted.(c)

programme.title: Killers
programme.desc: Spencer is an undercover assassin who falls in love with Jen and he decides to retire and marry her. After several years, he finds huge reward to kill him, which makes him doubt everyone around him ,so he hides at Jen's father, who was also an assassin and he tries to help him.(c)

programme.title: The Man in the Iron Mask
programme.desc: As the anger against King Louis XIV reaches boiling point, the three Musketeers unite with D'Artagnan to replace the hated king with his secret twin brother who has been imprisoned and put in an iron mask to hide his true identity.(c)

programme.title: 2 Fast 2 Furious
programme.desc: Brian O'Conner teams up with his ex-con friend Roman Pearce and undercover U.S. Customs Service agent Monica Fuentes to bring down Miami's drug lord Carter Verone.(c)

programme.title: The Fast and the Furious: Tokyo Drift
programme.desc: American teenager Sean likes to participate in illegal car races. When he wrecks his rival's car and a race ends in disaster, he's sent to his father in Tokyo to avoid a prison sentence, and there, he discovers the underworld of street racing.(c)

programme.title: Need for Speed
programme.desc: After being imprisoned for a crime he didn't commit, a street racer joins a cross-country race with a plan for revenge. When his ex-partner learns of his intentions, he places a bounty on his head as the race starts.(c)

programme.title: Assassin's Creed
programme.desc: With the aid of a technology that gives him access to his ancestors' memories through genetics, Callum takes a dive into the memories of his ancestor Aguilar, a member of the Assassins, to figure out a way to prevent the Templars from stripping people of their free will.(c)

programme.title: Spy Game
programme.desc: CIA operative Tom Bishop asks the retired Nathan Muir to help him when he is arrested in China. While on this mission, Nathan recalls all the situations that affected his and Tom's relationship.(c)

programme.title: World War Z
programme.desc: United Nations employee, Gerry Lane (Brad Pitt), must leave his family and traverse the world in a race against time to stop a Zombie pandemic that is crumbling armies and governments in its wake.(c)

programme.title: Army of Darkness
programme.desc: When a hardware store clerk is accidentally transported to the medieval days and captured by Lord Arthur, he is tasked with retrieving the Book of the Dead, as he embarks on a most perilous journey to get the Necronomicon that would help the person who has it get a fearsome army of ghouls.(c)

programme.title: The Kingdom
programme.desc: When an American facility in the Middle East is bombarded, a group of U.S. government agents is asked to investigate the incident and find the culprits in a snowballing battle.(c)

programme.title: The Last Witch Hunter
programme.desc: Today, Kaulder is the last witch hunter remaining, and has spent centuries hunting down rogue witches, all the while yearning for his long-lost loved ones. However, unbeknownst to Kaulder, the Queen Witch is resurrected and seeks revenge on her killer causing an epic battle that will determine the survival of the human race.(c)

programme.title: Divergent
programme.desc: In a future Chicago setting, people are divided into five distinct factions based on their personalities. Beatrice discovers that she is Divergent, meaning she does not fit into any one faction, and soon uncovers a sinister plot brewing in her seemingly perfect society.(c)

programme.title: Into the Blue
programme.desc: Two divers are living a quiet life, but a treasure hunt gets them into trouble with a drug lord after they come upon a missing cargo in a sunken plane.(c)

programme.title: Batman Begins
programme.desc: The film traces the emergence of Batman, as he travels to the Far East to study martial arts. He soon discovers about the League of Shadows, whose purpose is to eradicate the crime-ridden city of Gotham as it plunges into wickedness. Batman then starts his quest to combat corruption.(n)

programme.title: Fast Five
programme.desc: Dominic Toretto and his crew find themselves on the wrong side of the law once again as they plan a heist to buy their freedom while being watched by a ruthless drug lord and a relentless federal agent.(n)

programme.title: Fast & Furious 6
programme.desc: Federal agent Hobbs (Dwayne Johnson) enlists the aid of Dom (Vin Diesel) and his crew to bring a criminal mastermind Shaw (Luke Evans) and his gang to justice. In exchange for full pardons, they must put an end to their schemes, no matter how personal the cost.(n)

programme.title: Speed
programme.desc: Terrorists have cultivated a bomb on a public transportation bus. Once armed, the bus must stay above 50 mph to keep from exploding. An LAPD gets on the bus and tries to save as many people as he could from the tense situation.(n)

programme.title: The Dark Knight
programme.desc: Following a successful police crackdown on Gotham's criminal population, an unhinged new criminal appears to challenge both Batman and DA Harvey Dent's campaigns. Chaos and death follow in the Joker's walk as he makes the fight more personal than expected.(n)

programme.title: Insurgent
programme.desc: Beatrice Prior must go on saving the ones she loves and confront her inner demons to fight against a powerful alliance that is threatening her society.(n)

programme.title: The Rock
programme.desc: A group of rogue military men led by Gen. Francis X. Hummel threaten to launch a nerve gas attack on San Francisco. Hummel takes 81 tourists hostage and demands a ransom of $100 million.(n)

programme.title: Con Air
programme.desc: Former army ranger Cameron is newly paroled after being imprisoned for manslaughter. When his prison transport plane is seized by his fellow inmates, he has to pretend to be on their side as he searches for a way to stop them.(n)

programme.title: Pain & Gain
programme.desc: A trio of bodybuilders in Florida gets caught up in an extortion ring and a kidnapping scheme that goes terribly wrong.(n)

programme.title: The Gunman
programme.desc: A sniper on a mercenary assassination team, Martin Terrier (Sean Penn) retires to settle down with his girlfriend, but the organization he works for has other plans for him. Forced to return to Congo, where he had a successful assassination, he finds himself chased by his own his team.(n)

programme.title: Empire State
programme.desc: Based on true events, Chris Potatmitis settles for a security guard job at the Empire State Armored Truck Company after he disqualifies at the Police Academy. He mentions their faulty processes to his best friend, Eddie, and unexpectedly becomes part of an eleven million dollar heist. The police, and local crime bosses who are angered by their unapproved work in their turf, are now after them.(n)

programme.title: The Farewell
programme.desc: When her grandmother is diagnosed with terminal cancer, the headstrong Billi clashes with her parents over the decision to keep the diagnosis a secret from her grandmother. As the family gathers in China, ostensibly for a family wedding, they struggle to say goodbye without revealing the truth.

programme.desc: The story of a poor girl from southern Italy who comes to Milan to escape from her cheating fiancé. She finds a job as a sales representative in a store, but quickly gets into trouble with her manager.

programme.desc: As Brad and Dusty finally learned how to get along, they face a new challenge when their intrusive dads come to visit during Christmas.

programme.title: Meet the Parents
programme.desc: Male Nurse Greg Focker, who wants to commit to his girlfriend, Pam. Greg is shocked to learn that her father is conservative, and that he has to get his approval first. He goes to spend the weekend with her parents, but it seems that Jack doesn't like him, and belittles him throughout his stay. Greg then discovers that Jack is a retired CIA agent.

programme.title: Meet the Fockers
programme.desc: After meeting the parents of his girlfriend, male nurse Greg Focker invite the Byrnes to meet his parents. As different as it can be from the conservative family of the ex-CIA agent Jack Byrnes, the Fockers host their daughter-in-law's family and all hell breaks loose.

programme.title: Little Fockers
programme.desc: After Pam and husband Greg have twins, Greg faces a new challenge with his father-in-law, Jack. Greg must prove to the skeptical Jack that he's fully capable as the man of the house. But with all the misunderstandings, spying, and covert missions, will Greg pass Jack's final test and become inside the circle of trust ?

programme.title: Playing for Keeps
programme.desc: George Dryer, a charming former Scottish football star, is down on his luck and unable to find a sports-related job to pay his bills. He has a minimal connection with his son, Lewis, but as his ex-wife, Stacie, decides to remarry, he gets despondent and decides to pull his life together for his son and to win her back. To do this, he must rise above temptations, bribery and wrong career choices.

programme.title: Colors of Love
programme.desc: As Taylor Harris, a librarian who unexpectedly loses her job travels to her brother's tiny hamlet in Montana, she becomes embroiled in trying to stop businessman Joel Sheenan from renovating her brother's small-town hotel.

programme.title: Thirteen Days
programme.desc: As the Cold War is at its peak in October 1963, the American administration discovers that the Soviet Union has deployed nuclear missiles in Cuba, prompting US President Kennedy to intervene. programme.title: Gone Girl
programme.desc: On the occasion of his fifth wedding anniversary, Nick Dunne reports that his wife, Amy, has gone missing. Under pressure from the police and a growing media frenzy, Nick's portrait of a blissful union begins to crumble. Soon his lies, deceits and strange behavior have everyone asking the same dark question: Did Nick Dunne kill his wife.

programme.desc: During its maiden voyage in the North Atlantic in 1961, Russia's first nuclear submarine malfunctions, and it's up to Captain Alexei Vostrikov and Officer Mikhail Polenin to save the ship and prevent a nuclear disaster.(n)

programme.title: Dreamgirls
programme.desc: As Curtis tries to make it as a music manager, he provides a career change for a girls' band that consists of three soul singers. But as he tries to make the band into headliner material, he ends up demoting then firing the lead singer to replace her with another whom he deems more fit for stardom.(n)

programme.title: Gold
programme.desc: Based on a true story, the movie revolves around Kenny Wells and Michael Acosta, two friends who set off on an adventure in the uncharted jungle of Indonesia in the hopes of finding gold.(n)

programme.title: Lions for Lambs
programme.desc: Three parallel stories that take place in 90 minutes: an ambitious Republican Senator hopeful of presidential candidacy is conducting an hour-long television interview, while a university professor tries to motivate one of his students. At the same time, an army soldier is facing certain death in Afghanistan.(n)

programme.title: Rain Man
programme.desc: When his father dies, Charlie is shocked when he discovers that he left his fortune to Charlie's autistic savant older brother whom he never knew about. Desperate to get his father's inheritance, Charlie kidnaps Raymond and takes him on a cross-country trip to convince him to give up his inheritance.(n)

programme.title: Hell or High Water
programme.desc: A divorced father and his ex-con brother start a series of bank robberies to keep their family's ranch in West Texas, while two Texas Rangers try to catch them.(n)

programme.title: Censor
programme.desc: Enid, a film censor, sets out to solve the old mystery of her sister's disappearance after watching an oddly familiar video nasty, blurring the boundaries between fiction and reality in the process.(n)

programme.title: Love & Other Drugs
programme.desc: In 1990s Pittsburgh, the charming pharmaceutical salesman Jamie crosses paths with the free-spirited Maggie who has Parkinson's disease. As they develop a sexual relationship, they question whether a more committed relationship can be nurtured between the two of them.(n)

programme.title: Danny Collins
programme.desc: Aging rock star Danny Collins is still living on the edge at the age of 70, unable to organize his chaotic life. But when his manager discovers a recorded letter sent to him 40 years ago from John Lennon, Danny decides to amend his life and re-discover his purpose.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S2
programme.desc: Penny, a pretty woman coming from Omaha to California as an aspiring actress. She moves into the apartment across the hall from Leonard Hofstadter and Sheldon Cooper. Leonard and Sheldon are both brilliant Physicists. Colleagues, best friends and roommates Leonard and Sheldon have a relationship that is being continuously tested by Sheldon's deeply eccentric and non-convential attitude. programme.title: Twelve
programme.desc: A young drug dealer's life spirals out of control after his cousin gets murdered and his best friend is accused of the crime.

programme.title: The Bank Job
programme.desc: This film takes place in 1970s London; Terry Leather is a salesmen, happily married with children, and few secrets to keep. When an old friend, Martine Love, offers up a scheme to make some quick cash, Terry finds himself unable to refuse. With the help of a carefully selected crew including Kevin Swain and David Shilling, they rent a warehouse on Baker Street and begin tunneling to the nearby Loyd Bank. With their eye on the money stored in the bank’s safety deposit boxes, the crew finds themselves in for much more than they bargained.

programme.title: Austin Powers: International Man of Mystery
programme.desc: After he has been cryonically frozen for almost 30 years, spy Austin Powers is released into a much-changed world, but his mission hasn't changed; he has to partner up with Vanessa Kensington to fight his implacable enemy, Dr. Evil.

programme.title: Live Free or Die Hard
programme.desc: Veteran cop John McClane, is charged with investigating a different terrorist crime. The computers of the FBI's Cyber Crime Division were hacked on Independence Day, and his mission is to find and arrest the criminals behind it.

programme.title: The Mechanic
programme.desc: An elite hitman is successful working in the shadows. Now he's teaching his trade to an apprentice who is related to one of his previous victims.

programme.title: The Hitman's Bodyguard
programme.desc: When the best bodyguard in the world is appointed to protect a notorious hit-man to bring him to court, they both have to put their ego aside to reach court on time.

programme.title: The Toybox
programme.desc: As a father purchases a used RV to take his estranged family on a trip in an attempt to bridge the gap between them, the trip takes a horrifying turn when they get lost in the scorching desert, only to discover the terrible secrets that inhabit the RV that force them into a fight for survival.

programme.desc: An investigator has a series of interrogations with friendly Confederate soldiers, investigating the serial killings of local prostitutes and corrupt businessmen.(n)

programme.desc: Based on a true story, the film tells the story of a Special Forces team that was sent to Afghanistan right after the 9/11 attacks. Deep into enemy territory, the team faces unfavorable odds and make uneasy alliances as they try to take down the Taliban.(n)

programme.title: Killers
programme.desc: Spencer is an undercover assassin who falls in love with Jen and he decides to retire and marry her. After several years, he finds huge reward to kill him, which makes him doubt everyone around him ,so he hides at Jen's father, who was also an assassin and he tries to help him.(n)

programme.title: Conan the Barbarian
programme.desc: In a mythical world, the personal revenge of the barbarian warrior Conan turns into an epic battle against all of his adversaries and enormous monsters, at the heart of impossible odds, becoming the only hope of saving the great nations of Hyboria from the domination of supernatural evil forces.(n)

programme.title: Little Joe
programme.desc: Alice is a single mother who works as a plant breeder in a corporation developing a new species of flowers. As she takes one as a gift for her son Joe, both Alice and Joe start to fear the plant, leaving Alice to think that she might have just made a terrible mistake.(n)

programme.title: Angel Has Fallen
programme.desc: When Secret Service agent Mike Banning is framed for attempting to assassinate the president, he escapes his agency and the FBI to uncover the real threat and stop them before its too late.(n)

programme.title: Reasonable Doubt
programme.desc: When a young district attorney is involved in a hit-and-run, his guilt over the crime leads him to throw the trial of Clinton Davis who is charged with the murder in his stead. He soon finds out that he made a grave mistake when he realizes that Davis is a serial killer with ties to other crimes.(n)

programme.title: Twelve
programme.desc: A young drug dealer's life spirals out of control after his cousin gets murdered and his best friend is accused of the crime.(n)

programme.title: Live Free or Die Hard
programme.desc: Veteran cop John McClane, is charged with investigating a different terrorist crime. The computers of the FBI's Cyber Crime Division were hacked on Independence Day, and his mission is to find and arrest the criminals behind it.(n)

programme.title: Transsiberian
programme.desc: While traveling on board a train from China to Moscow, Roy and Jessie, an American couple, find themselves enmeshed in a web of murder and deceit after they meet two mysterious passengers.(n)

programme.title: Confessions of a Shopaholic
programme.desc: Rebecca Bloomwood (Isla Fisher) is obsessed with shopping, causing her financial problems. She gets a job writing in a financial magazine by accident, making her popular and admired by her boss Luke (Hugh Dancy). Rebecca has to figure out her way in life and try to overcome her addiction to shopping.

programme.title: The Duchess
programme.desc: A look into the life of the Duchess of Devonshire and her troubled marriage. Disillusioned by her husband's various affairs, the impatient expectancy of her to bear a male child and the public scrutiny, Georgina is broken down when her husband forces her to end her affair with Charles Grey.

programme.title: Words and Pictures
programme.desc: As they challenge each other on the way to falling in love, the rivalry between an art instructor and an English teacher comes to head when they decide to have their students decide which is more important: words or pictures.

programme.title: Lay the Favorite
programme.desc: Leaving for Las Vegas in the hopes of becoming a cocktail waitress, Beth gets entangled with a sports gambler who makes her an integral part of his operations. She soon falls for him, which lands her in hot water with his wife, Tulip.

programme.title: Wakefield
programme.desc: Howard Wakefield (Bryan Cranston) a successful New York City lawyer, goes through a bold turn in his family life. As he goes home from work one night ,and hides in his garage attic peeping from there, secretly watching the impact of his disappearance on his wife (Jennifer Garner) and family.

programme.title: Oranges and Sunshine
programme.desc: The true story of social worker Margaret Humphreys from Nottingham, who uncovers the scandal of the forcible migration of thousands of orphaned children from the UK to Australia, as she tries to reunite the estranged families and hold the government accountable.

programme.title: Summer Love
programme.desc: A widowed suburban mom gets more than she bargained for when a summer internship at a tech company lands her in the high-speed world of millionaire app designers. She soon becomes the center of attention of two very different executives.

programme.desc: An old custom where the performer of a good action gets to add a straw to the crib of baby Jesus during Christmas is carried out by a mother who is sick of her children's continuous quarrelling and arguing.

programme.title: Whatever Works
programme.desc: In the wake of a suicide attempt, Boris looks for a fresh start away from his upscale life that proves burdensome. His path intersects with Melody, a Southern beauty queen with none of the privileges and sophistication he possesses. As an unlikely bond forms, he imparts his life lessons on her.(n)

programme.title: Hope Gap
programme.desc: After 29 years of marriage, Grace's life falls apart after her husband tells her he's leaving her for another, as she tries to adjust to the shocking news, she discovers a new side of herself.(n)

programme.title: The Wedding Planner
programme.desc: A chance encounter between the perpetually-single wedding planner Mary and the pediatrician Steve leads to a spark to be ignited, only for Mary to discover that Steve is engaged to be married, and his bride-to-be is the same woman who just hired her to plan the biggest wedding of her career.(n)

programme.title: Havana Darkness
programme.desc: Three friends travel to Havana, Cuba, to investigate the origins of a mysterious manuscript supposedly written by the famous American writer Ernest Hemingway; they find themselves in a deadly cat and mouse game after being trapped in an abandoned building in the town center.(n)

programme.title: After Words
programme.desc: In a bid to overcome a crippling mid-life crisis, Jane takes a trip to Costa Rica, where love and adventure await her in the form of the younger Juan who turns her life upside down.(n)
Set in the 21st century; the lives of numerous strangers from all over the world are connected and influenced by one another through a series of random encounters.(n)
